revised_title: Physics and Applications of Thermotropic Liquid Crystals: Guest-Host Devices Using Anisotropic Dyes
tldr: The article discusses the physics and applications of thermotropic liquid crystals, specifically guest-host devices using anisotropic dyes. It reviews the state-of-the-art performance of these displays in terms of viewing angle, contrast ratio, and multiplexability. The author also explores the potential for future improvements in guest-host displays by analyzing trends in material development and technology.
